name: AntiMatter Mayhem
description:
For submission in the Game Maker's Tool Kit 2021 Summer Game Jam
Theme: Chained Together

This is my first game I've ever made from start to finish on my own.  All assets were made by me, unless noted otherwise. Created using Game Maker Studio 2.

CONTROLS
WASD - Move both fighters

SPACE - Fire

'P' - Pause/Unpause

'R' - Reset

'ESC' - Hold to quit

Pilot both your ship and the anti-matter ship to fight off trans-material life-forms, but don't let matter and anti-matter touch or else BOOM!

Music created using BeepBox (https://www.beepbox.co)
SFX created via BFXR (https://www.bfxr.net/)

Font for title sourced from FontSpace (https://www.fontspace.com)
The Macabre (https://www.fontspace.com/the-macabre-font-f32413)

Butcher the Baker (https://www.fontspace.com/butcher-the-baker-font-f28317)
